akn:content.akn:p: When a motion to terminate the parent and child relationship is filed, a judge shall promptly set a time for an adjudicatory hearing and shall cause notice thereof to be given to all parties.
A judge shall direct the issuance to and personal service upon the childâ€™s parent of a summons together with a copy of the motion to terminate the parent and child relationship.
When it is appropriate to the proper disposition of the case, a judge may direct the service of a summons upon other persons.
If a personal service under this section cannot be effected, then notice shall be made constructively pursuant to rules of the Superior Court of the District of Columbia.
